casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Dale RIDLEY. No. 272P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 18, 2006. John T. Hall, Raleigh, for Christopher Dale Ridley. William David McFadyen, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of May 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of May 2006."
